column1: Smoque BBQ////I am from the South
column2: North Carolina to be exact. Needless to say I grew up around good BBQ. I have also tried BBQ all over the country
column5: to st. louis. This place is pretty average
column6: and i don't see all the hype. The meats are pretty average quality
column7: but seem to be smoked pretty well
column8: though the flavor overwhelms you. I'm not a fan of the sauce
column9: which seems to be pretty much the same at all Chicago BBQ places. The sides are nothing to write home about either
column10: i had a tiny portion of mac and cheese
column11: which was pretty bland to me. Cornbread is not great either. I may be a little biased here
column12: but it's not the best place in the world.
